To fell a tree that regenerated after every axe swing.

questionArray.question: Why was The Green Monster at Fenway Park was originally built?
questionArray.correct_answer: To prevent viewing games from outside the park.
incorrect_answers: To make getting home runs harder.
allAnswers: To make getting home runs harder.
To prevent viewing games from outside the park.
